channel.title: starry night on d2h.net: flotsam, jetsam, & lagan

item.title: more vincent stuff…
item.description: looking through drscofield’s twitter messages of the past couple of days i noticed @pixelq’s twitter about “watching the world” and i had to head over to youtube to watch this 3D internet masterpiece once more. IMHO it’s one of the most beautiful pieces of art (and it’s a pity it wasn’t on display in basel recently) — have a look yourself: almost makes you cry… content.
